title: Account And Book Keeping
description: Bookkeeping and accounting are the backbone of any successful business. Our comprehensive services ensure that your financial transactions are systematically recorded, organized, and analyzed. Bookkeeping involves the daily recording of financial transactions, including purchases, sales, receipts, and payments. Accounting takes this a step further by interpreting, classifying, analyzing, reporting, and summarizing this financial data. We provide end-to-end solutions from managing ledgers and bank reconciliations to preparing crucial financial statements like the Profit & Loss Account and Balance Sheet, giving you a clear and accurate picture of your business's financial health and performance.

title: Internal/Concurrent Audit
description: An Internal or Concurrent Audit is a proactive and independent evaluation of your organization's internal controls, risk management, and governance processes. Unlike a statutory audit, its primary goal is to add value and improve operations. Our audit experts conduct a real-time or near-real-time examination of transactions to identify control weaknesses, operational inefficiencies, and potential compliance breaches before they escalate. This service helps in strengthening your control environment, preventing fraud, and providing assurance to the management that the organization's systems are functioning effectively and in line with business objectives.

title: Co-operative Audit
description: A Co-operative Audit is a specialized examination of the accounts and records of co-operative societies, mandated under the specific Co-operative Societies Act. Our audit process is designed to ensure that the financial statements of the society present a true and fair view of its affairs. We meticulously verify compliance with the relevant acts, rules, and by-laws, check the proper appropriation of profits, and assess the overall financial health of the society. This ensures transparency, protects the interests of the members, and maintains the society's legal and financial integrity.

title: Tax Audit
description: A Tax Audit is a mandatory examination of a taxpayerâ€™s financial records under Section 44AB of the Income Tax Act, 1961. It is required for businesses or professionals whose turnover or gross receipts exceed a specified limit. The purpose is to verify the accuracy of the income tax return filed and ensure compliance with tax laws. Our qualified Chartered Accountants conduct a thorough audit, preparing and filing the report in the prescribed forms (Form 3CA/3CB and 3CD). This not only ensures statutory compliance but also helps in avoiding penalties and facilitates a smoother assessment process by the tax authorities.

title: Direct Tax Filing
description: Direct Tax Filing, commonly known as Income Tax Return (ITR) filing, is the process of reporting your income, deductions, and tax liability to the Income Tax Department. It is a mandatory annual exercise for individuals and entities exceeding certain income thresholds. We simplify this complex process by assisting you in gathering all necessary documents, choosing the correct ITR form, accurately calculating your tax liability, and filing your return on time. Timely and accurate filing is crucial for avoiding penalties, claiming tax refunds, and as a proof of income for loans and visas.

title: Direct Tax Saving & Planning
description: Direct Tax Saving & Planning is a strategic and legal approach to optimize your tax liability. It goes beyond last-minute investments by creating a comprehensive plan aligned with your financial goals. We analyze your income structure and advise on the best use of permissible deductions, exemptions, and allowances under the Income Tax Act, such as Section 80C, 80D, HRA, and more. Our goal is to help you structure your finances in the most tax-efficient manner, thereby increasing your take-home income and channeling savings into productive investments for long-term wealth creation.

title: Direct Tax Scrutiny
description: Receiving a scrutiny notice from the Income Tax Department can be daunting. Direct Tax Scrutiny is the detailed examination of your income tax return by an Assessing Officer to confirm its accuracy. Our expert team provides comprehensive representation and support throughout this process. We help you prepare and organize all required documentation, draft well-reasoned responses to departmental queries, and represent your case before the tax authorities. Our professional handling ensures that your rights are protected and aims for a fair and judicious resolution, minimizing potential tax liabilities and penalties.

title: GST Registration & Filing
description: Goods and Services Tax (GST) is a cornerstone of India's indirect tax system. Our services cover the complete spectrum of GST compliance. We guide you through the GST Registration process, ensuring you obtain your GSTIN smoothly and quickly. Post-registration, we handle all aspects of GST Filing, including the preparation and submission of monthly, quarterly (GSTR-1, GSTR-3B), and annual returns (GSTR-9). We ensure accurate data compilation, proper claim of Input Tax Credit (ITC), and timely filing to keep your business compliant and avoid penalties.

title: GST Notice Handling
description: Receiving a GST notice from the tax department requires a prompt and precise response. Our GST Notice Handling service is designed to alleviate this stress. Whether the notice is regarding a mismatch in returns, a scrutiny inquiry, or a demand for tax, our experts will analyze the issue in detail. We will draft a comprehensive and legally sound reply, supported by relevant documents and justifications. We can also represent you before the GST authorities, ensuring your case is presented effectively and professionally to achieve a swift and favorable resolution.

title: Company Registration (Private/Public/OPC)
description: Starting a company in India involves a formal registration process under the Companies Act, 2013. We provide expert assistance for incorporating various types of companies, including Private Limited, Public Limited, and One Person Company (OPC). Our service covers every step, from obtaining the Director Identification Number (DIN) and Digital Signature Certificate (DSC) to name approval, drafting the Memorandum and Articles of Association (MOA & AOA), and filing the final incorporation forms. We ensure a seamless registration process, giving your business a separate legal identity, limited liability protection, and enhanced credibility.

title: GST Registration
description: GST Registration is mandatory for businesses whose turnover exceeds the prescribed threshold limit, as well as for certain other businesses like e-commerce sellers or those engaged in inter-state trade. Obtaining a Goods and Services Tax Identification Number (GSTIN) is the first step towards becoming GST compliant. We manage the entire registration process for you, from assessing applicability and preparing the necessary documents to successfully filing the application on the GST portal. A valid GSTIN enables you to legally collect taxes and claim Input Tax Credit, making your business part of the formal economy.

title: Partnership Firm Registration
description: Registering a partnership firm gives your business legal recognition and provides several advantages over an unregistered firm. Our services include the drafting of a comprehensive Partnership Deed, which clearly outlines the capital contribution, profit/loss sharing ratios, roles, responsibilities, and other terms agreed upon by the partners. We then handle the complete process of filing the application with the Registrar of Firms. A registered firm can sue third parties and provides a clear legal framework for dispute resolution among partners, thereby securing the interests of all stakeholders.

title: Trust Registration
description: Setting up a charitable or private trust in India requires legal registration to be a valid entity. We assist in the formation and registration of trusts for various purposes, including charitable activities, education, medical relief, and estate planning. Our service includes drafting a legally robust Trust Deed, which details the objectives of the trust, the settlor, trustees, and beneficiaries. We then manage the registration process with the appropriate authorities. For charitable trusts, we also assist in obtaining essential registrations like 12A and 80G for tax exemption benefits.

title: GST Filing
description: GST (Goods and Services Tax) filing is a mandatory compliance activity for all businesses registered under GST. It involves the submission of periodic returns detailing all sales, purchases, output GST collected, and Input Tax Credit (ITC) claimed. Our expert team ensures accurate and timely filing of all your GST returns, including GSTR-1, GSTR-3B, and the annual GSTR-9. We help you reconcile your books with the GST portal data, ensuring there are no discrepancies. Proper and punctual filing is crucial to avoid heavy penalties and maintain a good compliance rating.

title: Income Tax Filing
description: Income Tax Filing is the annual process where an individual or entity reports their earnings, deductions, and tax payments to the tax authorities. It is a legal obligation for most earning entities in India. We offer a hassle-free ITR filing service for salaried individuals, professionals, and businesses. Our process involves a thorough review of your financial data to ensure all income sources are reported correctly and all eligible deductions are claimed to minimize your tax liability legally. We ensure your ITR is filed accurately and before the due date, helping you stay compliant and secure.
